name: Hurry and no one gonna blows
name_original: Hurry and no one gonna blows
description:
• What is Hurry?:

Hurry and no one gonna blows is a game made for the  "Velocity"  Jam, hosted by FUMEC University during the month of June in 2021.

  •  Story:

During a party to commemorate the launch of the "Pencil 2"  by the Pencil Inc, a pencil that not necessary to sharp, but consume like a 5 more wood. In some moment of the party, a stream has started saying that's a bomb in the building, and everyone gonna die in few minutes. You play as the slime, a jornalist who had the misfortune to be in the wrong place in the wrong time, he need to talk with the people in the office to find the bomb and save us all.

  • Controls:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Right click with the mouse -  interact with objects and npcs

  • Our Team:

Vinícius(Vicilius) - Sound designer, Story.

Henrique - Programmer and Art, Cutscenes.
